page.title: 18Interesting People in Well
page.content: May,now over 80, was brought up by her Grandma in a draughty cottage,since demolished.She won a scholarship to Ripon High School - the 2 mile walk then a train ride was too much.She looked after the old folk and went out cleaning.Her son is an Oxford graduate! Still upright and vigorous at 80 Tom has been an unofficial roadman keeping the draining gulleys clear and sweeping the beck.He rings the bell at church & goes to every service in church & chapel. Sally used to be a cook and now nearly 80 she is still visited in her cosey home by her former mistress and family tho'they moved away.They make sure she hears important news at first hand. Annie uses her "green fingers" to grow all kinds of fuchias & geraniums in tubs and baskets,her yard is a delight
